responsibilities: Modernized a legacy application by building, testing, and deploying a modern full stack web app, Angular Typescript frontend with Express backend and GraphQL API. Performed on-call duties as primary point of contact to fix issues in QA, demo, and production environments.
achievements: Reduced total data queried from database through use of optimized SQL queries and GraphQL, retrieving only data needed per request.
Minimized redundant database queries by using performance profiling tools that identified and optimized problematic components.
Created more inclusive experience by working closely with UX designers, ensuring full accessibility of new and existing components.

responsibilities: Developed and deployed an internal web app that integrated existing processes used by R&D scientists. Communicated with stakeholders daily to develop new features, improve existing ones, and debug issues.
achievements: Accelerated the CI/CD pipeline to run 1000% faster by parallelizing the end-to-end Selenium test suite.
Reduced repetitive work by automating generation of testing documentation and code coverage reports required for each major software release.
Increased velocity of feature development by strategizing and leading the adoption of React and accompanying REST API for new pages and retrofitting existing pages.
Received team reward for on-time feature delivery, high test coverage, and low defect density.

responsibilities: Rebuilt legacy application using low-code tool, integrating with backend REST API in development. Drove a new initiative to create a customer portal for managing insurance policies.
achievements: Boosted development velocity to meet project deadlines by bootstrapping React component library.
Increased client engagement by winning support for client portal projects that reduced friction of access between client and client data.
